article_title: Why Changing Health Care Is Hard

article_metadata.description: It seems as if a large number of health care leaders have developed a new form of “Executive Tourette’s Syndrome,” whereby they have lost the ability to control the utterance of the word “Innovation.” At the very least, the use of this particular term has moved from urge past obsession, [...]
